name: MTLFunctionType
desc: The type of a top-level Metal Shading Language (MSL) function.

items.name: case vertex
items.desc: A vertex function you can use in a render pipeline state object.

items.name: case fragment
items.desc: A fragment function you can use in a render pipeline state object.

items.name: case kernel
items.desc: A kernel you can use in a compute pipeline state object.

items.name: case intersection
items.desc: A function you can use in an intersection function table.

items.name: case visible
items.desc: A function you can use in a visible function table.
